channel.title: Glacius Sword V2. First Model, Worked on abit more
channel.description:
Well after making My First Model the Glacius sword, I decided to take People's advice and improve on it. Here is what I got.
[IMG]http://i760.photobucket.com/albums/xx242/GodOfWarLS/DemesticPK/GlaciusSword.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i760.photobucket.com/albums/xx242/GodOfWarLS/DemesticPK/3-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i760.photobucket.com/albums/xx242/GodOfWarLS/DemesticPK/2-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i760.photobucket.com/albums/xx242/GodOfWarLS/DemesticPK/1.jpg[/img]
Please rate out of 10 and tell me how I could have improved. Keep flaming to a minimum.

item.title: Glacius Sword V2. First Model, Worked on abit more
item.dc:creator: @DeltaLegitz DeltaLegitz
item.description:
@DeltaLegitz wrote:

Yeh I’ll keep it in mind for next time, Thanks Coon.

Read full topic

item.title: Glacius Sword V2. First Model, Worked on abit more
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, well, the color choice isnt the best (dont get yourself down on that) but as off the over-all design, CJ is right, it has been done a few times. Umm, the only thing i see wrong is that its boxy, and needs to be rounded out a bit more.

Read full topic

item.title: Glacius Sword V2. First Model, Worked on abit more
item.dc:creator: @DeltaLegitz DeltaLegitz
item.description:
@DeltaLegitz wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:7, topic:320357”][quote author=DeltaLegitz link=topic=416836.msg3065626#msg3065626 date=1261198382]

Too Square, also sword over made. make your own creation and it would be good… lol not flamin or anything just giving advise. also try using Metasequoia. i use that. very good. i like

Meh lol I don’t think so but I dont want to start an arguement. I don’t mind.

You better stop drinking. I use Metasequoia too? What makes you think I don’t…
[/quote]
you should take it as a comment. meta is frowned upon by most modellers so think of it as he thinks its too good for meta.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Glacius Sword V2. First Model, Worked on abit more
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

This sword has been made so many times.

Anyway, the shape on the blade seems fairly good, few rough faces, can’t help that though.
The hilt is very, square like, need to give it some shape, and maybe some more detail, the other versions of this sword I’ve seen had more colours and, uh, things on the handle.

Read full topic
